PAGE_HEADER_SCHED: Access is not allowed at this time
COUND_NOT_OPEN_PAGE_EX: The page requested could not be loaded at this time. Please make sure you are able to connect to the DVR server and that the server is running.
DSCED_HEADER: Access to live view is not allowed for this account at this time.
DSCED_MSG: You can not use web interface at this time. If this is a mistake, please contact your system administrator.
LANG_DIE_COULDNOTCONNECT: Fatal error: could not connect to the database:
LANG_DIE_COULDNOTOPENCONF: Fatal error: could not read configuration file.
CHANGES_FAIL: Could not apply changes at this time, please try later.
ENABLE_DEVICE_NOTENOUGHCAP:
Card does not have sufficient capacity to accomodate this device.
Please reduce Resolution/Framerate of other deivces on this card.
NEW_DEV_NEFPS: The device was configured using generic configuration, but there is insufficient card capacity to enable it. Please reduce framerate/resolution of other devices and try again.
G_DISABLE_VERSION_CHECK_EX: requires server to have internet access
G_DVR_NAME_EX: You can name your dvr after its location or usage
G_DISABLE_WEB_STATS: Disable Stats display in the web UI
G_DATA_SOURCE_LIVE: Live (You need an active internet connection)
G_MAX_RECORD_AGE_EX: Let system remove all recordings older than given number of days (optional)
G_VAAPI_DEVICE_EX: Render node used for VAAPI hardware acceleration of video decoding and encoding
G_SUBDOMAIN_API_BASE_URL_NAME_EX: You can input the base url of subdomain provider
G_SMTP_EMAIL_FROM_EX: When Bluecherry service sends email, this value is used as sender address ("From")
G_SMTP_FAILED: Unable to send mail with this configuration.
CAMERA_PERMISSIONS_LIST_TITLE: click on camera names to allow/restict access
USERS_ALL_TABLE_SUBHEADER: Users currently registered in the DVR system.
USERS_DETAIL_TABLE_SUBHEADER: Edit user information and access rights.
DELETE_USER_SELF: You can not remove your own user record
USERS_CHANGEPASSWORD_EX: User is asked to change password
LOGIN_WRONG: Wrong login/password combination, please try again.
LOGIN_OK: Please wait while you are redirected...
NA_WEB: You do not have permission to use web interface
NA_CLIENT: You do not have permission to use remote client
DEVICE_ENCODING_UPDATED:
Video standard setting changed.
For the change to take effect you need to restart the server.
DB_FAIL_TRY_LATER: Could not apply changes. Please make sure you are able to connect to the DVR server and that the server is running.
MMAP_SELECTOR_TITLE: Use these selectors to choose sensitivity level to fill in the grid below
BUFFER_TITLE: Choose how many second to record before and after motion events
SCHED_SELECTOR_TITLE: Use these selectors to fill in the schedule below
GLOBAL_SCHED_OG: Use device-specific schedule for this camera.
SIGNAL_TYPE_NOT_CONFD: Configure at least one device first
SCHED_SEL_TYPE: Please select use select the type of recording and click on desired day/hour to change recording type for that period.
NO_NEWS: There are no news right now.
NO_CARDS: There are no supported video capture cards detected on this system.
NO_DEVICE_NAME: Name field can not be empty.
NO_USERNAME: Login field can not be empty.
NO_EMAIL: Email field can not be empty.
NO_PASS: Password field can not be empty.
CANT_REMOVE_ADMIN: You can not remove your own admin priveleges.
USER_KICKED: Your session was terminated by an Administrator.
USER_NACCESS: You need administrator priveleges to access this page. Please login again.
USER_RELOGIN: Your session has expired, please relogin.
NO_CONNECTION:
Cound not connect to the server.

Please make sure that:
-server httpd is running
-you are online
ACTIVE_USERS_SUBHEADER: Users currently using this DVR server
AU_CANT_EOS: You can not terminate your own session.
AU_INFO: Kicking user will end session from that IP address, ban user for 5 minutes and require re-login. Banning user will remove all access priveleges (can be restored on user page).
AIP_NEW_LIST_AVAILABLE: It appears that a newer version of our supported camera list is available. Would you like to upgrade to this version?
AIP_NEW_LIST_AVAIL: New ip camera tables are available.
AIP_NEW_LIST_MYSQL_E: Could not update the database, please check Apache logs for details
AIP_CAN_NOT_GET_NEW_LIST: Could not load the new tables from the server. Please try later
AIP_ALREADY_EXISTS: Camera with these settings already exists in the list of the devices.
AIP_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: Camera with this name already exists. Names must be unique.
AIP_NEEDIP: Please enter ip address of the camera
AIP_CAMADDED: IP camera has been successfully added
AIP_LIMIT_ALLOWED_DEVICES: Could not add a camera, because exceeds the limit of the allowed devices.
COUND_NOT_CONNECT: Could not connect to the camera to perform the setup, please do so manually
IPCAM_WIKI_LINK: Is your IP camera not in the list? We maintain a larger list of MJPEG and RTSP paths here. If you run into problems, please join us on Gitter or Matrix (https://www.bluecherrydvr.com/chat/) and we'll try to add support for your camera.
NOT_UP_TO_DATE_LONG: New version of the server was released. We strongly recommend to update.
NOT_UP_TO_DATE_LINK: For release notes and update instructions, please visit our forums.
DELTE_CAM_CONF: Are you sure you want to delete this camera (ID:
USERNAME_EXISTS: User with this username already exists.
QUERY_FAILED: Could not execute query. Please check /var/log/apache2/error.log for details.
WRITE_FAILED: Failed to write to storage folder at:
MJPEG_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND: Device with ID {{ID}} was not found.
MJPEG_NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to access camera ID {{ID}}.
STORAGE_INFO_MESSAGE:
Please note that if you add a new storage location, you need to make sure that:
- folder exists
- folder is empty
- folder belongs to user bluecherry, group bluecherry.
DIR_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_NOT_READABLE: Server could not open the specified directory "{{PATH}}". See Note 2.
DIR_NOT_READABLE: Specified directory "{{PATH}}" exists, but is not readable. See Note 2.
DIR_NOT_EMPTY: Specified directory is not empty, all contents will be deleted after it is added.
DIR_OK: Specified directory exists and is writable. Click "save" to add this location.
IP_ACCESS_STATUS_F: Could not connect to the {{TYPE}}. Please verify that the camera is turned on and the IP address is correct.
IP_ACCESS_STATUS_404: Incorrect {{TYPE}} path, please check camera manual for correct paths.
IP_ACCESS_NCONFIG: Could not connect to the camera. Please verify hostname/ip address.
IPP_NEW: Create a custom set of PTZ commands
IPP_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete preset "
IPP_EDIT_HELP:
Please fill in the preset commands according to the manufacturers specifications.

The following varialbes are accepted:
%s - Username to access the camera
%s - Password to access the camera
%s - ID for the command, e.g. position preset ID
IPP_PRESET_NEEDS_STOP_EX: whether camera needs a stop command
IPP_PRESET_HTTP_AUTH_EX: use http auth or GET parameters
IPP_PRESET_PORT_EX: Specify port, if non-standard port is used
STS_SUBHEADER: distribution of events by type and date range
STS_PICKER_HEADER: Choose date range and event types
NTF_ADD_RULE_TITLE: Add a new rule for notifications
NTF_ADD_RULE_DATETIME: Select days and time for notifications
NTF_LIMIT_LABEL: Limit of emails sent in the per hour [0 for unlimited]
NTF_NO_RULES: There are currently no notification rules
NTF_E_USERS: You must select at least one user
NTF_E_DAYS: You must select at least one day of the week
NTF_E_TIME: Start time must be before end time
NTF_E_CAMS: You must select at least one camera
NTF_TEMPLATE:
Send an email to {{USERS}}
on {{DAYS}}
between {{STIME}} and {{ETIME}}
for events on {{CAMERAS}}.
BACKUP_R_CONF: Restoring your database will permanently remove all current data. We sttongly suggest performing current backup before using restore.
BACKUP_SUBHEADER: save a backup of the database or restore from a saved backup
BACKUP_PWD: Please enter the password for the database user {{USERS}} to for the {{DBNAME}} database:
BACKUP_R_WRONG_FILETYPE: File is expected to be a compressed tar archive. Please upload a proper backup file.
BACKUP_R_NOINFO: Could not read the backup information file. This may mean that the archive is corrupted or contains invalid data. Proceeding may cause loss of data.
BACKUP_R_LABEL: Please choose a previously saved backup:
BACKUP_R_INFO:
Backup files uploaded.
Backup date: {{DATE}}
Event data: {{E}}
Device data: {{D}}
User data: {{U}}
BACKUP_FAILED: Could not perform the backup. Is the database password correct?
BACKUP_R_FAILED: Could not restore the database. Mysql returned the following error:
BACKUP_R_SUCCESS: The database successfully restored. Please reload the page.
BACKUP_R_WARN: Please note that all tables in the backup will be irreversibly overwritten once restore is complete. Please enter the database password to continue.
L_CONFIRMCODE_MSG: Unfortunately we could not confirm the license key automatically. Please check your internet connection and try again, or contact Bluecherry to obtain authorization license key using this unique id:
L_INVALID_LICENSE: The license key you entered does not appear to be valid. Please make sure that it is typed in or copied exactly as provided. If you continue to experience this problem, please contact Bluecherry.
L_INVALID_LICENSE_EXISTS: The license key you entered is already in use on this system.
L_INVALID_CONFIRMATION: Confirmation license key you entered is invalid. Please make sure that it is typed in or copied exactly as provided. If you continue to experience this problem, please contact Bluecherry.
L_LICENSE_ACTIVATED: The license key was successfully activated.
L_LICENSE_DEACTIVATED_DB_FAIL:
The license key was deactivated.
But this license key isn't removed from database due to database problem.
Please remove this manually later.
L_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to deactivate this license key?
L_NO_LICENSES: You have no active License key.
L_AUTO_RESP_1: This license key does not exist.
L_AUTO_RESP_2: This key was already used on a different machine. If you recently made changes to your computer configuration, please contact Bluecherry to reset your license.
L_AUTO_RESP_3: Sorry, you made too many unsuccessful authorization attempts per day. Please contact Bluecherry or try again later.
L_AUTO_RESP_4: Sorry, you need to contact Bluecherry via phone or email to obtain authorization.
L_AUTO_RESP_5: Sorry, an error was encountered while authorizing your license. Please try again later or contact Bluecherry.
L_LA_EXPIRED: The license has expired or system time has been tampered with. Ensure your date and time settings are correct.
L_LA_GRACE_PERIOD_OVER: The grace period for server sync is over.
L_LA_TRIAL_EXPIRED:
The trial has expired or system time has been tampered with. Ensure your date and time settings are correct.
If your date and time settings are correct, please buy the license and activate this application.
L_LA_LOCAL_TRIAL_EXPIRED: The local trial has expired or system time has been tampered with. Ensure your date and time settings are correct.
L_LA_RELEASE_UPDATE_AVAILABLE: A new update is available for the product. This means a new release has been published for the product.
L_LA_RELEASE_NO_UPDATE_AVAILABLE: No new update is available for the product. The current version is latest.
L_LA_E_SYSTEM_PERMISSION: Insufficient system permissions. Occurs when LA_SYSTEM flag is used but application is not run with admin privileges.
L_LA_E_FILE_PERMISSION: No permission to write to file.
L_LA_E_TIME: The difference between the network time and the system time is more than allowed clock offset.
L_LA_E_INET: Failed to connect to the server due to network error.
L_LA_E_BUFFER_SIZE: The buffer size was smaller than required.
L_LA_E_APP_VERSION_LENGTH: App version length is more than 256 characters.
L_LA_E_LICENSE_TYPE: Invalid license type. Make sure floating license is not being used.
L_LA_E_OFFLINE_RESPONSE_FILE_EXPIRED: The offline activation response has expired.
L_LA_E_ACTIVATION_LIMIT: The license has reached it's allowed activations limit.
L_LA_E_ACTIVATION_NOT_FOUND: The license activation was deleted on the server.
L_LA_E_DEACTIVATION_LIMIT: The license has reached it's allowed deactivations limit.
L_LA_E_TRIAL_NOT_ALLOWED: Trial not allowed for the product.
L_LA_E_TRIAL_ACTIVATION_LIMIT: Your account has reached it's trial activations limit.
L_LA_E_MACHINE_FINGERPRINT: Machine fingerprint has changed since activation.
L_LA_E_METADATA_KEY_LENGTH: Metadata key length is more than 256 characters.
L_LA_E_METADATA_VALUE_LENGTH: Metadata value length is more than 256 characters.
L_LA_E_ACTIVATION_METADATA_LIMIT: The license has reached it's metadata fields limit
L_LA_E_TRIAL_ACTIVATION_METADATA_LIMIT: The trial has reached it's metadata fields limit.
L_LA_E_METADATA_KEY_NOT_FOUND: The metadata key does not exist.
L_LA_E_TIME_MODIFIED: The system time has been tampered (backdated).
L_LA_E_METER_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND: The meter attribute does not exist.
L_LA_E_METER_ATTRIBUTE_USES_LIMIT_REACHE: The meter attribute has reached it's usage limit.
L_LA_E_CUSTOM_FINGERPRINT_LENGTH: Custom device fingerprint length is less than 64 characters or more than 256 characters.
L_LA_E_VM: Application is being run inside a virtual machine / hypervisor, and activation has been disallowed in the VM.
L_LA_E_RATE_LIMIT: Rate limit for API has reached, try again later.
L_LA_E_BC_SERVER: A problem occured while connecting bc-server.
L_LA_E_TRIAL_ACTIVATED: Trial is activated. Trial days left:
L_LA_E_TRIAL_ACTIVATE_REQUIRE: Either trial has not started or has been tampered, for activating trial please click here.
ACTI_STREAMING_SET_3: Your ACTi camera has been automatically configured for RTP over UDP streaming.
ACTI_STREAMING_N_SET_3: Your ACTi camera could not be automatically configured for RTP over UDP streaming. Please do so manually.
VIVOTEC_SETRAMING_SET: Your Vivotec camera has been automatically configured to use MJPEG codec on the second encoder.
VIVOTEC_SETRAMING_N_SET: Your Vivotec camera could not be automatically configured to use MJPEG codec on the second encoder. Please do so manually.
